verses.roman:
śata dui phala prabhu śīghra pāḍāila
prakṣālana kari' kṛṣṇe bhoga lāgāila

synonyms: śata—hundred; dui—two; phala—fruits; prabhu—the Lord; śīghra—very soon; pāḍāila—caused to be picked up; prakṣālana—washing; kari'-doing; kṛṣṇe—to Lord Kṛṣṇa; bhoga—offering; lāgāila—made it so.
translation: The Lord immediately picked about two hundred fruits, and after washing them He offered them to Kṛṣṇa to eat.
